name: Are the chain lines vertical when the basilisk is right side up?

children.name: Does a chain line run clearly and directly through the center of the watermark?
Is the object next to the basilisk a shield?
Does one of the basilisk's feet cross an edge chain line?
Is the tip of the basel crosier open (instead of closed)?
Does one of the basilisk's legs clearly come between its belly and the house?
Does the tip of the tail cross the chain line?
Does the tip of the wing touch the chainline?
